note: Gameplay & Narrative Designer, Writer, Occasional Streamer, Anarchoqueer, and Goblin Queen.

content.html:
Vultures are holy creatures.
Tending the dead.
Bowing low.
Bared head.
Whispers to cold flesh,
‚ÄúYour old name is not your king.
I rename you ‚ÄòEverything.‚Äô‚Äù

(From my poetry collection Field Guide to the Haunted Forest by Jarod K. Anderson.) #poetry

content.html:
This is your year non-trans folks. This is the year

to be the one to call out grandma for misgendering your non-binary cousin,

to point out how fucked up your uncle‚Äôs transphobic jokes are, or

to tell your mom that her excuses for deadnaming someone aren‚Äôt good enough.

It‚Äôs time to make this your problem. How are you going to stand up for trans people this holiday?

It‚Äôs time to make this your problem. How are you going to stand up for trans people this holiday?

content.html: Ok but is there a word for a humanoid monster stitched together from disparate human parts? Cause the fact that there isn't makes me think that calling such a thing "a frankenstein" is just good linguistic development.
content.value: Ok but is there a word for a humanoid monster stitched together from disparate human parts? Cause the fact that there isn't makes me think that calling such a thing "a frankenstein" is just good linguistic development.

content.html: A mindblowing spectacle by monarch butterflies in Pacific Grove today. The slight warmth meant they were quite active, with thousands of them flying around and forming new clusters. I can only imagine what this would have been like decades ago before the decline in numbers.
content.value: A mindblowing spectacle by monarch butterflies in Pacific Grove today. The slight warmth meant they were quite active, with thousands of them flying around and forming new clusters. I can only imagine what this would have been like decades ago before the decline in numbers.

content.html: This whole D&D OGL situation is such a bummer. It's a shame there aren't literally thousands of other games for which the question "can I make and sell content for this or stream games of it" would be met with several seconds of blank, uncomprehending blinks, followed by "yes!"
content.value: This whole D&D OGL situation is such a bummer. It's a shame there aren't literally thousands of other games for which the question "can I make and sell content for this or stream games of it" would be met with several seconds of blank, uncomprehending blinks, followed by "yes!"

content.html: I don't want self-driving cars, I want robots that can sort garbage and recycling so I can go back to dumping everything in one bin.
content.value: I don't want self-driving cars, I want robots that can sort garbage and recycling so I can go back to dumping everything in one bin.

content.html: Even in slow motion, the wings of this Anna's hummingbird beat faster than any other bird. So cool to see these tiny jewels for the first time.
content.value: Even in slow motion, the wings of this Anna's hummingbird beat faster than any other bird. So cool to see these tiny jewels for the first time.

Taken over a year to get a decent pic of a rifleman/titipounamu. NZ‚Äôs smallest bird, with the infuriating habits of hanging out in dense, dark forests and not sitting still. Luckily they‚Äôre outrageously cute‚Ä¶

content.html: This is one of the most beautiful things I've ever seen

photo.alt:
A discussion between Dr. Bashir and Garak of Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, illustrated with their photos.
Bashir: Do you think the rail workers should strike?
Garak: All exploited workers should strike!
Bashir: Even if it will disrupt the economy?
Garak: ESPECIALLY if it will disrupt the economy.

Our Paint 0.1 is released for Linux! Yay!

Download at https://ChengduLittleA.com/ourpaint
